analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/11/0xa87620e1bb293050c24ba325832f656f096e407c.sol:
	Contract BetCommunity has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/11/0xa87620e1bb293050c24ba325832f656f096e407c.sol#217)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/11/0xa87620e1bb293050c24ba325832f656f096e407c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/11/0xa87620e1bb293050c24ba325832f656f096e407c.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/11/0xa87620e1bb293050c24ba325832f656f096e407c.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
